body: This really should have a Mind Control tag to this. The collar around her neck is capable of messing with her slutty little brain , and her master is clearly using it to further enslave her and erode her dignity. It's honestly so fucking hot knowing he's invading her mind to make her so obsessed with his dick that she'll feed her squad a massive helping of shit from her fat ass. That and abandoning her dignity by claiming Valkyrie girls are just toilets for her master while spewing her fattest pile of shit yet all over Lunaria's face (No wonder Lunaria became the sexiest, most fuckable shit-eating pig toilet). But the best ending was achieved with her fully embracing her future as a shit-eating pig wife by voiding her bowels all over her uniform. Her oinking alone confirms this is the hottest mind control doujin.
